section1.p: To find the correct remote Buddycloud server for a domain, the Buddycloud server will first attempt discovery the responsible Buddycloud Server using a DISCO query, and, failing that, then attempt DNS discovery.

section3.anchor: Discovering the Buddycloud server using Disco
section3.p: The Buddycloud server first sends an items discovery request to the domain to discover all the available components.

example.caption: The Entity sends a disco#items request to the domain

section3.p: The server replies with the list of available components, along with their associated JIDs.

example.caption: The server replies with a list of available components.

section3.example: <iq type='result' from='capulet.lit' to='juliet@capulet.lit/balcony' id='items1'> <query xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#items'> <item jid='muc.capulet.lit' name='Chatrooms' /> <item jid='buddycloud.capulet.lit' name='Buddycloud Server' /> </query> </iq>

section3.anchor: Discovering the Buddycloud server using DNS
section3.p: It's possible to use a PTR record to delegate Buddycloud services to a remote Buddycloud server using a PTR record.

example.caption: PTR record for buddycloud server discovery

section3.p: This example will delegate all the Buddycloud service to a Buddycloud server running at buddycloud-component.verona.lit .

section2.p: The entity then iterates through the <item/> elements, sending an info discovery request to each JID.

example.caption: The Entity sends a disco#info request to each component

section2.p: Each component replies with its identity. The Buddycloud server has an identity of category 'pubsub' and type 'channels'.
A domain MUST only host one component with an identity of category 'pubsub' and type 'channels'.

example.caption: The Buddycloud server replies with its identity

section2.example: <iq type='result' from='buddycloud.capulet.lit' to='juliet@capulet.lit/BuddycloudApp' id='info2'> <query xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#info'> <identity category='pubsub' type='channels' /> <identity category='pubsub' type='inbox' /> <feature var='jabber:iq:register' /> <feature var='http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#info' /> <feature var='jabber:iq:search' /> </query> </iq>
